title: A Love Never Lost
overview: A Love Never Lost tells the story of Yang Kai Zhi, who is determined to study abroad for a revolutionary cause, meets Yu Tian Bai, an ardent revolutionary of the old democracy, and Qiu Hong, a follower of foresight and thought, and becomes classmates with Li Ren Jun, a descendant of the aristocracy of the late Qing Dynasty who is chosen to study abroad, and is influenced by Yang Yifan, who understands the importance of thought on the road to revolution. Wrapped up in the times, all of them explore their personal fate and the fate of the times, and eventually move towards different paths of life choices.
